# CANSARD

<!-- badges: start -->
  [![R-CMD-check](https://github.com/see24/CANSARD/workflows/R-CMD-check/badge.svg)](https://github.com/see24/CANSARD/actions)
  <!-- badges: end -->

The goal of CANSARD is to be a home for the The Canadian Species At Risk Database (CAN-SARD), track changes overtime, and automate the validation process.
